person_say: I've been really stressed lately, and it's keeping me up at night. I think I need some help with that.
animal_say: Have no worries, my friend! There's a cuddly bear named Bruno who can help you with stress and sleepless nights. Would you like to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to get some help with my stress and sleepless nights.
animal_say: Yay! Here comes Bruno, the mindfulness master of the forest! He's ready to help you relax and catch some zzz's!
